places.name: Lalbagh Botanical Garden
places.description: A beautiful botanical garden with a variety of flora and historical monuments.

places.name: Bangalore Palace
places.description: A grand palace built in 1878, inspired by England's Windsor Castle.

places.name: Cubbon Park
places.description: A lush green park in the heart of the city, perfect for a relaxing stroll.

places.name: ISKCON Temple
places.description: A beautiful temple dedicated to Lord Krishna, known for its serene atmosphere.

places.name: Bannerghatta National Park
places.description: A national park with a zoo, aquarium, and safari park, great for family outings.

places.name: Vidhana Soudha
places.description: A magnificent legislative building known for its impressive architecture.

places.name: MG Road Bus Stop
places.description: A major bus terminal in the central business district of Bangalore.

places.name: Majestic Bus Station
places.description: One of the busiest bus terminals in Bangalore, connecting various parts of the city.
